quoteText:
Upon cancellation or suspension, your right to use the Services will stop immediately.
Attempting to evade a cancellation or suspension (such as by creating a new account or using an alternate account) is a violation of these Terms.
title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

tosdr.case: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
